casebody.data:
CHARLES F. HOLTZ, Plaintiff and Appellant, v. HENRY G. SCHMIDT et al., Defendants and Respondents.

Before Barbour, Ch. J., Curtis and Van Vorst, JJ.

Decided December 31, 1873. Charles Wehle, for appellant. Charles Tracy, for respondent.

Opinion by Barbour, Ch. J.

Dissenting opinion by Curtis, J.

Action to recover damages for/breach of agreement.

Appeal from judgment in favor of defendant.

Judgment affirmed.
